post:
We've expanded our Denver offering and upgraded our hardware. We will also be adding plans on a higher quality network in Lenoir, NC. Essentially your options are quantity or quality, although we will demand performance from our hardware in both locations. I do not want to mislead you about what I am offering. FDC Denver is not as bad as people make it out to be, but it also isn't perfect.

As always, you must agree to our Terms of Service: http://catalysthost.com/tosaup.php

We do not allow material considered illegal in the United States. The most important rule is this: Don't be a jerk.
